Class UdpPeers

  • java.lang.Object

    public class UdpPeers
extends java.lang.Thread

    This class represents a UDP peers and contains the server and client logic code.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UdpPeers

        public UdpPeers(boolean verbose,
                int serverPort,
                boolean json,
                java.lang.String label,
                ServiceMessageListener serviceMessageListener)
        Parameters:
        verbose - a boolean value to set the debug/verbose mode.
        serverPort - an integer value to set the listening port number.
        json - a boolean value to use json or bytes in network transfer.
        label - a String value which represents the label used to identify device.
        serviceMessageListener - a serviceMessageListener object which contains callback functions.

      • sendMessageTo

        public void sendMessageTo(MessageAdHoc msg,
                          java.net.InetAddress serverAddr,
                          int serverPort)
        Method allowing to send a message to a remote UDP peer.
        Parameters:
        msg - a MessageAdHoc object which represents a PDU exchanged between nodes.
        serverAddr - remoteAddress a String value which represents the IP address of the remote peer.
        serverPort - an integer value to set the remote listening port number.
